name: Talking Stick
description: Dynamic channel moderation and speaking privilege management for live events, panels, and Q&A sessions.

settings_schema.header: Configure who can bypass talking stick restrictions by default.
settings_schema.footer: Uncheck any role to subject them to talking stick permissions.

settings.help_text: System administrators can always post, regardless of talking stick permissions.
Team administrators can always post, regardless of talking stick permissions.
Channel administrators can always post, regardless of talking stick permissions.
Bot accounts can always post, regardless of talking stick permissions.
Messages containing these phrases will be silently suppressed. Enter one phrase per line (case-insensitive). Default phrases: 'silence is golden', 'helpful progress report'
settings.default:
silence is golden
helpful progress report
